Limitations

adulting 101

While we at TIM believe, that the software provided can be a extremely useful tool for many people, it is imperative for our users to understand the software limitations of this. TIM is by no means a substitute for an accountant, fincial-advisor,doctor, lawyer, or psycologist. The information, found in the adulting 101 section, is refrencing current up to date information. However, the information on here should be treated more as a rule of thumb, and not direct advice for you the users current situation. If you do have concerns that need to be adressed, please consult the professionals previously stated respectfully as needed.

The budgetting Software.

In terms of the budgetting software, it is based on the zero based budgetting methodology. And that is how All the calculations in regards to the out-put (what you the end user sees). Is derived from. Everyone's fincial Situation is unique to them, and it is strongly encouraged that you talk with accountants, fincial advisors, and finance lawyers, when doing your specific fincial strategy. The limitations of this tool is for a personal budget, and by no means sophisticated to the point to perform business strategy with.
